seed_pair.known: Learning Chinese isn't easy but it is fun.
seed_pair.target: 学中文不容易，但很有趣。

practice_phrases: You can learn Chinese next week.
I don't know how to learn Chinese.
Could you help me learn Chinese?
I want to learn Chinese next week.
Are you sure you want to learn Chinese?
I know you don't mind, I want to learn Chinese.
我知道你不介意，我想学中文。
I don't know if it's easy.
I know learning Chinese is easy.
You don't mind, learning Chinese is easy.
你不介意，学中文很容易。
Are you sure learning Chinese is easy?
你确定学中文很容易吗？
Are you sure it's not easy?
I know learning Chinese is not easy.
You don't mind, learning Chinese is not easy.
你不介意，学中文不容易。
Are you sure learning Chinese is not easy?
你确定学中文不容易吗？
I want to help you, learning Chinese is not easy.
我想帮你，学中文不容易。
I know learning Chinese isn't easy.
Are you sure learning Chinese isn't easy?
你确定学中文不容易吗？
I don't know, learning Chinese isn't easy?
我不知道，学中文不容易吗？
Learning Chinese isn't easy, I know.
You don't mind, learning Chinese isn't easy.
你不介意，学中文不容易。

你能帮我吗？学中文不容易。

我知道学中文不容易，你确定吗？

你确定你不介意吗？学中文不容易。
I know learning Chinese is interesting.
Learning Chinese isn't easy, it's interesting.
I don't know if it's interesting.
Are you sure learning Chinese is interesting?
你确定学中文很有趣吗？
I know learning Chinese is very interesting.
Are you sure it's very interesting?
Learning Chinese isn't easy, very interesting.
You don't mind, learning Chinese is very interesting.
你不介意，学中文很有趣。
Are you sure learning Chinese is very interesting?
你确定学中文很有趣吗？
I know, but it is fun.
Not easy, but it is fun.
Learning Chinese, but it is fun.
I know it's not easy, but it is fun.
我知道不容易，但很有趣。
Are you sure? But it is fun.
I don't know, but it is fun.
You don't mind? Learning Chinese isn't easy, but it is fun.
你不介意吗？学中文不容易，但很有趣。
Learning Chinese isn't easy but it is fun.
学中文不容易，但很有趣。
